channel.title: Tutorialr.com
channel.description: Your online source for original tutorials covering a variety of topics

item.title: Setup and Start
item.description: Learn how to Setup and Start Visual Studio 2019

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Introduction to the Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Command Bar
item.description: Create standard-looking interface for applications for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Data Input
item.description: Use InputScope for on-screen Keyboards and save and load application data for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Image Rotate
item.description: Use Storyboard and DoubleAnimation to rotate an Image in the X, Y and X axis for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Custom Dialog
item.description: How to use the ContentDialog to display a customised popup dialog for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Navigation View
item.description: How to use NavigationView to display hamburger-style navigation for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Drag and Drop
item.description: How to use a ListBox to create a simple drag-and-drop example for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Photo Rotate
item.description: How to use BitmapTransform to create a simple image-rotating application for Universal Windows Platform
